anime.name: Sailor-fuku Sinryō Tsumaka
anime.info: Nozomu is a student in the field of psychiatry. Recently he had submitted a report where he writes how women's current distresses originate from past mental conflicts, especially during adolescence; and by removing their past afflictions with hypnotism and making them experience a satisfying school life, their depression would be cured. His report gets discarded as a far-fetched theory so Nozomu takes it upon himself to prove it in practice. He manages to get three girls for his experiment: Mirai, his mother, Kyouka, Mirai's friend, and Izumi, his old friend. Like this, his grand experiment involving "married women in sailor's uniforms" starts....
Sailor-fuku Sinryō Tsumaka 前編 @ Vanilla (Adults Only!)
Sailor-fuku Sinryō Tsumaka 後編 @ Vanilla (Adults Only!)
